pullRequest.title: [Test] Skip node_type setting in transport client
pullRequest.bodyText:
The license integTest would copy node settings into the transport
client settings. This no longer works (since #64015) because the
node types generated in the server test case are not applicable to
transport client

commit.message:
[Test] Skip node_type setting in transport client

The license integTest would copy node settings into the transport
client settings. This no longer works (since #64015) because the
node types generated in the server test case are not applicable to
transport client

nodes.bodyText: Is this comment out of place? I understand it is carried over from the previous method. But should it be in the transportClientPlugins method?
